data: Go to learnprogramming r/learnprogramming • blue-grayconcur83 Português (Brasil) Italiano What are your community opinions on using Python for beginners in learnprogramming? Hey everyone! I've been learning Python as my first language on my learnprogramming journey and I'm curious to hear what the community thinks about it. Do you believe Python is a good language for beginners to start with? What are the pros and cons in your opinion? Let's start a discussion and share our thoughts! Read more Share
